words.apple: a round fruit with red or green skin and crisp flesh
words.airplane: a powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces

words.banana: a long curved fruit with a soft yellow skin
words.butterfly: a flying insect with large, often colorful wings

words.cat: An animal that has a lot of species

words.hasty: done or acting with excessive speed; hurried
words.harmonious: forming a pleasing or consistent whole
words.heroic: having the characteristics of a hero or heroine; very brave
words.humble: having or showing a modest or low estimate of ones importance
words.hungry: feeling the need to eat; having a craving for food
words.happy: feeling or showing pleasure or contentment
words.helpful: giving or ready to give help; useful
words.hopeful: feeling or inspiring optimism about a future event
words.harmonize: bring into consonance or accord; make compatible
words.hallucination: an experience involving the apparent perception of something not present
words.heartwarming: causing feelings of happiness and pleasure
words.high-pitched: having a high frequency or tone
words.horoscope: a forecast of a person future, typically based on the relative positions of the stars and planets at the time of that person birth
words.hospitality: the friendly and generous reception and entertainment of guests, visitors, or strangers
words.humanitarian: concerned with or seeking to promote human welfare
words.hypothesis: a supposition or proposed explanation made on the basis of limited evidence as a starting point for further investigation
words.hydration: the process of causing something to absorb water
